name: Protocol, hostname/IP, port and URL match
description: This matches any URL in this format: protocol://hostname(:80)(/something/else/here)Group 1 is protocol(without ://) - letters onlyGroup 2 is hostname or IP - letters, dots, dashes, numbers, underscores onlyGroup 3 is port (without :) - numbers onlyGroup 4 is the rest of the URL - letters, dots, dashes, numbers, underscores, slashes only
author: Runemoro
